name: Ready To Die
description:
Survive for as long as you can.

Use your grenades to keep you alive.

Enemies get tougher over time.

Shoot everything!

Rapidly Tap the shoot button  (Arrow Key) to fire your gun.

Tap the bomb button ('Z 'key) to trigger an explosion when in shooting range. (Recharges every 10 seconds)

Tap the stun button ('X' key) to temporarily immobilise enemies. (Kill enemies to charge)

Game Engine: Unity3D

UI: https://www.photopea.com/

3D models: Blender

Audio: https://freesound.org/
